attributes.action: Let the uk citizens vote, on who is mayor of London not just Londoners.
attributes.additional_details:
The whole of the uk should be allowed to vote on who becames mayor of our capital city , as what happens in London also effect the outer towns and city,  
So voting should be changed to allow people living outside London the chance to have their say through a vote who they would like see became mayor of London.
attributes.background: London being the capital city,  all uk citizens should have a say who became  mayor.
